snippet: Hamilton will start the Bahrain Grand Prix in Sakhir from the pole position for the first time after clinching his fourth straight pole of the season, finishing well ahead of Ferrari’s Sebastian Vettel.
abstract: Lewis Hamilton clinches pole position in Bahrain Grand Prix auto race.
lead_paragraph: Hamilton will start the Bahrain Grand Prix in Sakhir from the pole position for the first time after clinching his fourth straight pole of the season, finishing well ahead of Ferrari’s Sebastian Vettel.

headline.main: Lewis Hamilton Takes Pole in Bahrain
